Welcome to CoDriver! CoDriver is a desktop application for managing your tasks and deadlines.
It is optimized for use via a Command Line Interface (CLI) while still having the benefits of a Graphical User Interface
If you can type fast, CoDriver can help you manage your tasks faster than traditional GUI apps.
Add a todo task to the list.
Got it. I've added this task:
Now you have <number of tasks> tasks in the list.
On a successful operation, the task will be added to the list and the number of tasks will be displayed.
Add a deadline task to the list. The date should be in the format `YYYY-MM-DD`.
Got it. I've added this task:
Now you have <number of tasks> tasks in the list.
On a successful operation, the task will be added to the list and the number of tasks will be displayed.
Add an event task to the list. The dates should be in the format `YYYY-MM-DD`.
Got it. I've added this task:
Now you have <number of tasks> tasks in the list.
On a successful operation, the task will be added to the list and the number of tasks will be displayed.
List all tasks in the list.
Here are the tasks in your list:
On a successful operation, all tasks in the list will be displayed.
Mark a task as done. The task number is the index of the task in the list.
Nice! I've marked this task as done:
On a successful operation, the task will be marked as done and the updated task will be displayed.
## Marking a task as not done `unmark`
Mark a task as not done. The task number is the index of the task in the list.
Ok, I've marked this task as not done yet:
On a successful operation, the task will be marked as not done and the updated task will be displayed.
Delete a task from the list. The task number is the index of the task in the list.
Now you have <number of tasks> tasks in the list.
On a successful operation, the task will be removed from the list and the number of tasks will be displayed.
Find tasks that contain the given keyword.
Here are the matching tasks in your list:
On a successful operation, all tasks that contain the keyword will be displayed.
Exit the program. You must use this command to save the tasks to the hard disk.
Bye. Hope to see you again soon!
On a successful operation, the program will exit.
CoDriver will detect and prevent the addition of duplicate tasks. It will not allow you to add a duplicate task
that is already in the list.
* The CoDriver program is a task manager that helps users keep track of their tasks.
